field.createdAt.description: The time when the usage record was created.

field.statusCode.description: The status code of the usage record.

field.application.description: The application program for the service.

field.status.description: The status of the application program.

field.usedAmount.description: The amount of resources that have been used.

field.deductedAmount.description: The amount of resources that have been deducted.

field.remainingAmount.description: The amount of resources that remain.

field.metadata.description: The metadata of the usage record.

title.totalUsed.description: The title of the usage summary card.

title.usageTrend.description: The title of the usage trend chart.

shortcuts.today.description: Shortcut to select today's time range.

shortcuts.last1Day.description: Shortcut to select the time range for the last 1 day.

shortcuts.last3Days.description: Shortcut to select the time range for the last 3 days.

shortcuts.last7Days.description: Shortcut to select the time range for the last 7 days.

shortcuts.last1Month.description: Shortcut to select the time range for the last 1 month.

placeholder.startDate.description: Placeholder for the start date in the date range selector.

placeholder.endDate.description: Placeholder for the end date in the date range selector.

placeholder.to.description: Separator text in the date range selector.
